tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_performance (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  performance_rating INT,
  training_records jsonb
)
CREATE TABLE employees (employee_id INT, employee_name VARCHAR(255), department VARCHAR(255), hire_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE training_records (record_id INT, employee_id INT, training_type VARCHAR(255), training_date DATE, trainer_name VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE training_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    training_type VARCHAR(50),
    training_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE employees (employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  hire_date DATE NOT NULL,
  performance_score INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE training_records (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  training_date DATE NOT NULL,
  training_description TEXT,
  trainer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  review_date DATE NOT NULL,
  review_comments TEXT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE lean_initiatives (initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  initiative_description TEXT,
  initiative_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  initiative_lead VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (
   review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   employee_id INT,
   reviewer_id INT,
   review_date DATE,
   performance_score INT
);
